title: E-Learning-Based Offline Education Design for Business Mathematics

context.prior_knowledge: Elementary Mathematics and Business Environment Understanding
context.additional_context: Blended approach combining online materials and offline activities is necessary for delivering business mathematics content in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can accurately perform financial calculations (averages, ratios, ROI) through case analyses based on work scenarios.
Learners can solve at least 80% of statistical problems (basic probability, mean-variance) using mobile-compatible online library resources.
Learners can explain the budgeting and forecasting modeling process step-by-step based on the standard curriculum provided online.

resources: Offline Workbook and Calculation Practice Sheets
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
